DOC.brief_summary: This single center , open phase I dose escalation study . This study assess high tolerable intratumoral dose ipilimumab ( Yervoy ) combination IL-2 ( Proleukin ) patient unresectable stage III-IV melanoma accessible cutaneous , subcutaneous , and/or nodal lesion . The objective primarily assess safety drug combination , secondarily obtain preliminary data clinical efficacy combination .
